title: Student Government Association
description: Serve as a representative for your class and help make important decisions about school policies and activities
benefits: Leadership experience, public speaking, decision-making skills
requirements: Elected by peers, good academic standing

title: National Honor Society
description: Recognize and promote academic excellence, leadership, service, and character
benefits: Scholarship opportunities, college applications, community service
requirements: 3.5+ GPA, leadership experience, community service hours

title: Debate Team
description: Develop critical thinking and public speaking skills through competitive debate

requirements: Strong research and speaking abilities

requirements: Interest in international affairs, research skills
